levels.title: Using Functions
levels.description: Learn how to use functions with and without inputs.
levels.milestone_summary: Congratulations! You've completed your first level and learned how to use functions with and without inputs.
levels.milestone_content:
# You Did It! üéâ

You've completed your first level and taken your first steps into the world of programming!

## What you've learned:
- How to call functions to make things happen
- How to use functions without inputs
- How to use functions with inputs to control their behavior
- How to solve problems by breaking them down into steps

## Next steps:
- Continue to the next level to build on these skills
- Practice what you've learned
- Keep experimenting and having fun!

You're on your way to becoming a great programmer. Keep going!

lessons.title: Welcome to Jiki
lessons.description: Meet Jiki and learn the basics of how coding works.

lessons.title: Solve the Maze
lessons.description: Guide Jiki through a maze using simple instructions.

lessons.title: Using Functions
lessons.description: Learn about functions, the little machines that make things happen.

lessons.title: Space Invaders
lessons.description: Shoot down some aliens in your first taste of Space Invaders.

lessons.title: Functions Taking Inputs (Numbers)
lessons.description: Learn how to give extra information to functions.

lessons.title: Maze Solve Walk
lessons.description: Navigate the maze using a function that walks multiple steps.

lessons.title: Fix the Wall
lessons.description: Patch up the gaps in a broken wall with rectangles.

lessons.title: Snowman Basic
lessons.description: Build a snowman from three circles.

levels.title: Strings and Colors
levels.description: Learn how to use strings and colors to make your programs more colorful and expressive.
levels.milestone_summary: Excellent work! You've learned how to use strings and colors to create colorful drawings.
levels.milestone_content:
# Great Progress! üé®

You've mastered using strings and colors in your programs!

## What you've learned:
- How to use strings to work with text and names
- How to use colors to make your drawings more vibrant
- How to combine shapes and colors to create complex images

## Next steps:
- Continue building on these skills
- Create even more complex and colorful programs
- Keep experimenting with different combinations!

You're becoming a skilled programmer. Keep it up!

lessons.title: Strings
lessons.description: Learn how to use text in your programs.

lessons.title: Foxy Face
lessons.description: Build a geometric fox face from colourful triangles.

lessons.title: Penguin
lessons.description: Complete a symmetrical penguin drawing.

lessons.title: Sunshine
lessons.description: Add a bright sun to a weather scene.

lessons.title: Cloud, Rain and Sun
lessons.description: Create a full weather scene with clouds, rain and sunshine.

lessons.title: Jumbled House
lessons.description: Rearrange the pieces of a jumbled-up house.

levels.title: Repeat Loop
levels.description: Learn how to repeat actions using loops to make your code more efficient.
levels.milestone_summary: Great job! You've learned how to use repeat loops to make your programs more powerful and efficient.
levels.milestone_content:
# Fantastic Work! üîÅ

You've mastered the repeat loop - one of the most powerful tools in programming!

## What you've learned:
- How to use loops to repeat actions
- How to write more efficient code with less repetition
- How to solve problems that require doing the same thing multiple times

## Next steps:
- Apply loops to more complex challenges
- Combine loops with everything else you've learned
- Keep building your programming skills!

You're making excellent progress. Keep going!

lessons.title: Repeat Loop
lessons.description: Learn how to tell Jiki to do things multiple times.

lessons.title: Maze Solve Repeat
lessons.description: Refactor a maze solution to use loops instead of repeated code.

lessons.title: Golf Rolling Ball Loop
lessons.description: Roll a golf ball into the hole using a loop.

lessons.title: Space Invaders Repeat
lessons.description: Use loops to efficiently destroy a wave of aliens.

levels.title: Variables
levels.description: Learn how to store and reuse values using variables.
levels.milestone_summary: Excellent! You've learned how to use variables to store and reuse values in your programs.
levels.milestone_content:
# Outstanding Work! üì¶

You've mastered variables - a fundamental building block of programming!

## What you've learned:
- How to create and use variables to store values
- How to make your code more flexible and reusable
- How to change values in one place and see results everywhere
- How variables make complex programs easier to manage

## Next steps:
- Use variables in more complex programs
- Combine variables with loops and functions
- Keep building your programming toolkit!

You're becoming a real programmer now. Keep going!

lessons.title: Creating/Using Variables
lessons.description: Learn how to save and retrieve information in your programs.

lessons.title: Snowman
lessons.description: Set the right variable values to build a snowman.

lessons.title: Traffic Light
lessons.description: Draw a traffic light using variables for position and size.

lessons.title: Arithmetic + Variables
lessons.description: Learn how to do maths with variables.

lessons.title: Relational Sun
lessons.description: Position a sun where everything's calculated from variables.

lessons.title: Relational Snowman
lessons.description: Rebuild your snowman so all sizes scale from one variable.

lessons.title: Relational Traffic Lights
lessons.description: Rebuild your traffic light so everything scales together.

levels.title: Basic State
levels.description: Learn how to update variables and track changing values over time.
levels.milestone_summary: Amazing! You've learned how to use variables to track state and create dynamic programs.
levels.milestone_content:
# Incredible Progress! üìà

You've mastered using variables to track state - a crucial programming skill!

## What you've learned:
- How to update variables to track changing values
- How to use state to make your programs dynamic
- How to combine all your skills to create complex programs

## Next steps:
- Apply state management to more complex challenges
- Keep experimenting and having fun!

You're well on your way to mastering programming. Keep it up!

lessons.title: Updating Variables
lessons.description: Learn how to change variable values as your code runs.

lessons.title: Plant the Flowers
lessons.description: Plant a row of flowers across the garden, one by one.

lessons.title: Rolling Ball
lessons.description: Roll a golf ball into the hole by tracking its position.

lessons.title: Finish the Wall
lessons.description: Lay a row of bricks using a loop and a position variable.

levels.title: Functions That Return Things
levels.description: Learn how functions can return values, and explore colors, animation, randomness, scope, scenarios, and nested loops.
levels.milestone_summary: Congratulations! You've mastered functions that return things and explored many powerful programming concepts.
levels.milestone_content:
# Level Complete!

You've completed the Functions That Return Things level. Keep going!
